Individual Reflection Report (10%)
Write a 1000-word reaction note in terms of your learning and challenge in the course. In your critical reflection paper, please touch upon the following points.

• What did you learn about yourself (attitude, perception, presumption, values) with regard to the group work?
• How did your experience in the course redefine your career plan?
